title: Eat to Feed: 80 Nourishing Recipes for Breastfeeding Moms
description: Support breast milk supply and overall health with creative meals, snacks, and drinksFor breastfeeding moms, "eating for two" continues long after the baby arrives. Eating well can be hard enough before there's a newborn in the house, but when moms experience dips in their milk supply, getting the right nourishment is key. In their debut cookbook, the founders of Oat Mama share eighty simple, delicious recipes for breakfasts, lunches, dinners, deserts, snacks, and beverages. Eat to Feed is a warm, supportive, and inspiring resource for new mothers and mothers-to-be,
author: Eliza Larson
